file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastFormatter.format: Will be deleted after the next reboot (Move failed)
Will be deleted after the next reboot (Clean failed because the file is encrypted)
Will be deleted after the next reboot (Clean failed because the virus could be new)
Will be deleted after the next reboot (Clean failed, file has multiple extensions)
Will be deleted after the next reboot (Clean failed because the detection isn't cleanable)
Will be deleted after the next reboot (Clean failed)

FastField.defaultValue: Unwanted Program "$9" detected. File Left Alone
Rule "$9" violated by "$14" trying to access "$13"
